workspace_parameters.description: Property.  This service contains the definition for a request to the motion  planner and the output it provides  Parameters for the workspace that the planner should work inside

start_state.description: Property.  Starting state updates. If certain joints should be considered  at positions other than the current ones, these positions should  be set here

path_constraints.description: Property.  No state at any point along the path in the produced motion plan will violate these constraints (this applies to all points, not just waypoints)

trajectory_constraints.description: Property.  The constraints the resulting trajectory must satisfy

pipeline_id.description: Property.  The name of the planning pipeline to use. If no name is specified,  the configured planning pipeline will be used

planner_id.description: Property.  The name of the planning algorithm to use. If no name is specified,  the default planner of the planning pipeline will be used

group_name.description: Property.  The name of the group of joints on which this planner is operating

num_planning_attempts.description: Property.  The number of times this plan is to be computed. Shortest solution  will be reported.

allowed_planning_time.description: Property.  The maximum amount of time the motion planner is allowed to plan for (in seconds)

max_velocity_scaling_factor.description: Property.  Scaling factors for optionally reducing the maximum joint velocities and  accelerations. Allowed values are in (0,1]. The maximum joint velocity and  acceleration specified in the robot model are multiplied by thier respective  factors. If either are outside their valid ranges (importantly, this  includes being set to 0.0), the factor is set to the default value of 1.0  internally (i.e., maximum joint velocity or maximum joint acceleration).

cartesian_speed_end_effector_link.description: Property.  Maximum cartesian speed for the given end effector.  If max_cartesian_speed <= 0 the trajectory is not modified.  These fields require the following planning request adapter: default_planner_request_adapters/SetMaxCartesianEndEffectorSpeed
